specialAnnouncement: The singing on **26th October** is off because a good group of us are going to the London All-Day. We'll be back at singing again on **8th November**.
text: ***We sing every 2nd and 4th Saturday of the month from 2pm - 4pm*** at [***Antioch House, 66 Crossgate, Durham, DH1 4PR***](#venue).
